valdef-contain-inline-size.name: inline-size
valdef-contain-inline-size.summary: The contain CSS property allows an author to indicate that an element and its contents are, as much as possible, independent of the rest of the document tree. Containment allows the browser to calculate layout, style, paint, size, or any combination of them for a specific area of the DOM. Changes within an element with containment applied are not propagated outside of the contained element to the rest of the page, leading to performance benefits through fewer DOM re-renders.
valdef-contain-inline-size.title: contain
